intro: Psychotria pleuroneura, commonly known as the black psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, Colombia, and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its dark, glossy leaves and small, white to greenish flowers. It often grows in shaded, moist environments within tropical rainforests. Psychotria pleuroneura is also known for its use in traditional medicine and its role in local ecosystems.
